title: What’s the best affordable MIDI keyboard: Akai MPK Mini Mk2 or M-Audio Oxygen 25? - Quora

response.answer_text: At this point it is a matter of preference. Feel, comfort, and ergonomics play a huge role in which controller you get. Remember, both of them already have similar controls (assuming this is the Oxygen with trigger pads). Try to get your hands on them. Check how the keys feel, and if they’re big enough or small enough for you. See if you like the size of the whole unit. See if you prefer a joystick or wheel control. And so on.

Between those two, the MPK Mini is probably a better built piece of kit. But if you actually like playing stuff in with two hands then both of them are useless, and you should save up an extra few notes for a 49-key one at least.
